entries.cant_work: Go away an' let a pirate drink. Ye have too many things goin' on right now.
entries.dontknowyou_1: Go away! I don't need your help.
entries.next: I have nothin' else fer ye today.
entries.notit_1: No, go back out an' try again, scrawny kid.
entries.notyet: Ye can't help me, go away.
entries.npc_1_1: I be admirin' the bravery of 'dem pirates. Kidnappin' nobles, keepin' 'em locked up fer ransom. Hmm.. I bet yer hankerin' ta find where they be keepin' dem nobles.
entries.npc_2_1: Fine. Gimme yer datapad. Let me see wha' I can do wit' it. I hope I don't break it. Ha ha!
entries.npc_3_1: Yer nothin' but a coward. Ye couldn't go up against pirates anyway. Yer a scrawny kid.
entries.npc_4_1: Neh. Just that they be kidnappin' nobles all over Naboo, keepin' 'em for ransom.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Get ye goin' then, kid! Don't waste me time on yer belly-achin'.
entries.npc_breech_1: Where is my sister? I must find my sister! You! Will you go find her? She was captured by pirates! They demand that we pay some sort of ransom for her return. Please help me! You can find the pirate hideout here; I've marked it on your map.
entries.npc_failure_1: Ye can't do anythin' right, can ye?
entries.npc_more_1_1: I have no other information for you except that the hideout can be found in the mountains. Please help me. I'm desperate!
entries.npc_reset: Pah! Get out o' here an' let me drink in peace.
entries.npc_reward_1: I have nothin' fer ye. Ye were only suppose ta' investigate.
entries.npc_work_1: Oh, it's the scrawny kid. What did ye find out?
entries.player_2_1: No, I'm not interested in anything a drunk pirate has to say.
entries.player_3_1: Do you have anymore information about these pirates?
entries.player_more_1_1: What other information do you have?
entries.player_sorry: Nothing. I still have some investigating to do.
entries.waypoint_description_1: A deserted bunker inhabited by vile pirates. Rumors have said that several nobles are held here for ransom.
